reviews.review_msg: Has passive aggressive tendencies and can be scary at times.

Pros: He gives a lot of bonus marks. (e.g. For the midterm, the max grade a student could get was about 120%.). His marking scheme is also generous. Cons: Very unclear instructions especially on quizzes and the project. I had to make a guess what he expects. His exam instructions were clear, though. Overall: Not a bad prof for self-reliant learners
